review: connected right away and works better than Chromecast
author: Amazon Customer

review: It works fine, just what I expected. The only glitch is that after I first set it up, it dropped my wifi network and said it was "connected with a problem." Of course there was no way that I could determine what that problem was. However, I rebooted the FireStick and it has worked fine since.
author: Peter S "Peter"

review: Great stick. Bought it as a pre-order for $20, and its nicer then my Chromecast, because it has a dedicated remote, and it supports Amazon Video on Demand. Also includes the option to doanlowd Netflix , Hulu, all the other standard streaming apps. Lets you play some games on it if you have a bluetooth controller.
author: J. Castineiras

review: So much better than the clunky Amazon app on my Vizio TV.  Bought this for the other TVs which don't have the built-in app and it is so much more intuitive and easy-to-use.  Video loads quickly, and it is easy to pause, fast forward and rewind.  A must-have for Prime subscribers.
author: A.P.

review: I would not recommend this product at all. t plays for a short time and then quits. Now it won't play at all. It says its has an acknowledgement problem. Reviews I have read on the internet says that many people are having these problems
author: xyz

review: Setting up is easy and intuitive. UI is very smooth and the title presentation is much better than many competing products or built-in versions found on some Smart TVs. Rented/Purchased YouTube video contents are unable to be played back using the youtube.com app. Streaming video quality is very good.
author: Gadgeteer

review: Doesn't add features not already available on smart TV's or other set top devices.It ddi come pre-configured with my account details, that made setup easier. The Smart phone app to control it works well.
author: JP

review: Just love it. Easy to use and works well with my tv.  Like it better than the Roku.
author: Amazon Customer "abeewar"

review: This will be a 5 when it supports captive portal for hotel logins.  The ONLY reason that I bought this was to take on the road.  For the time being, it is useless.  Do we have a timeline on that?
author: Stump "Stump"

review: I eagerly awaited the arrival of my Fire Stick!  Unfortunately, after I completed the set up, it stopped working. After talking to 3 helpful techs on-line, it was determined to be a malfunctioning devise. Stick 2 arrived after 4 days. Also defective. I'm done with this and will probably buy Roku.
author: Nancy M. Sweet
